> Tia, Tia, Tia. You poor, misguided, foolish, foolish child.

and

I'm sorry. Can I ever be forgiven for my transgression? Please, Sandra.
I'll be good. (On the first try, I wrote goof. Maybe I should have left
it.) <g>
Tia who's glad that Pam is back

Tia, Tia, Tia. You poor, misguided, foolish, foolish child.

Don't you KNOW that Sandra has Ultimate Power and controls the thoughts and
behaviors of us all, most especially Helen (list owner) and Joyce (list
moderator)?

Sandra = Yoda on steroids. Never forget.

Your brainwashed pal,

Pam "You Don't Need to See Our Identification" Hartley
